title: 卧槽，刚刚习惯性的看了看BBS官方微博
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-2-4 23:15 编辑 

居然看到朝鲜有一台Minecraft的服务器！求白名，求IP，我要和萌萌的三胖一起玩！！



顺便说下，MC服务器最多的是美利坚合众国，多达40000余台，第二的是只有美利坚一半的德国22000多，第三是法国18000多

没看走眼的话然后是荷兰、加拿大，俄罗斯，英国，捷克（噗）、波兰、天朝？

天朝紧接着就是MC的故乡瑞典，有1400多台服务器
张成泽肯定被ban了【斜眼



来自一个澳大利亚的论坛
According to MCstats there’s only one Minecraft server available in North Korea. Only one man has the power, only one man could be playing. It leads to one inevitable conclusion… is Kim Jung Un a Minecraft fan?This hilarious image popped up on Reddittoday courtesy of beechboy2000. It’s taken from MCstats, a service that provides metrics on Minecraft. It seems too good to be true!Obviously, it could be anyone. Absolutely anyone could be playing Minecraft over in North Korea. But it is plenty fun to imagine North Korea’s supreme leader playing Minecraft!

replies.author: Exsu
replies.txt_content: 国内小游戏服还真不给力QAQ

replies.author: MO28
replies.txt_content: 表示看不懂，好厉害的样子
